page.title: 12More School Now.
page.content: We eat apples at playtime. They are 2p. They are good for our teeth. Then we go back to class until dinner. The dinners are great. Today we had fish fingers, jacket potatoes, beans and cream buns. We play football or Chain He after dinner . In the afternoon we go in with the Top Juniors. I am a Lowere Junior and we have our own teacher in the mornings. In T.J. we do drama, singing, painting or clay, or games like cricket or rounders, or we go swimming in the school pool. I did 25 lengths for the sponsored swim and raised Â£2.50. Sometimes we go out on a visit for the Domesday project with somebody's Mum or a teacher and we enyoy that. Domes day is a great project. We have been to all sorts of places, farms and workshops, talking to people and doing questionnaires and surveys.
